nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects

Class AnimatedSpriteObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects.GameObject
      • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects.SpriteObject
        • nl.han.ica.OOPDProcessingEngineHAN.Objects.AnimatedSpriteObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IKeyInput, IMouseInput, processing.core.PConstants

    public abstract class AnimatedSpriteObject
extends SpriteObject
    The AnimatedSpriteObject is an extension of SpriteObject. It expects a Sprite object which is one image and includes multiple Sprites. This object cuts the Sprite in separate Sprites.
